title: High Ping, Booted, and Punished
body: I am not okay with today's events. I have a 1200 ping, I went to join a bot game, and the connection timed out. I went to log back in and try again (immediately after being booted) and I have the 5 minute wait timer. How is this even okay? I took screenshots as well.

replies.body:
It sounds like you're experiencing a fluctuating and unstable connection to the servers. High jumps in latency can often be caused by ISP routing changes in how your connection reaches the server, however, some local network settings can cause these issues as well. Our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) addresses the most frequent solutions for issues with local network configuration. 

Let me know if you continue to have high latency and disconnections from game after working through that guide.
I responded to your request in another discussion, please follow the link I posted and let us know the results.
